purpose: Facilitates threat modeling and visualization of AI agents built with various frameworks to enhance security and understanding.
principle: Integrates with frameworks like LangGraph, AutoGen, and CrewAI to model and visualize AI agent interactions and potential vulnerabilities.
reusability: Offers a CLI tool that can be integrated with existing AI agent frameworks for enhanced security visualization and threat modeling.
limitations: Focuses primarily on AI agents built with specific frameworks; may require adaptation for others.
name: Agent-Wiz
description: A CLI tool for threat modeling and visualizing AI agents built using popular frameworks like LangGraph, AutoGen, CrewAI, and more.
highlight: Combines threat modeling with AI agent visualization to enhance security analysis.
